byline.original: By CAROL VOGEL; Compiled by ADAM W. KEPLER

abstract: Maxwell L Anderson, director of the Indianapolis Museum of Art since 2006, is appointed director of the Dallas Museum of Art.
snippet: Maxwell L. Anderson, who has been director of the Indianapolis Museum of Art since 2006, has been appointed director of the Dallas Museum of Art.
lead_paragraph: Maxwell L. Anderson, who has been director of the Indianapolis Museum of Art since 2006, has been appointed director of the Dallas Museum of Art.
